Florence was raised in a humble family and due to a lack of tuition fees, never got the opportunity to go to college. As a result of this, she never got any formal employment and didn’t surrender to that. She started farming, and through farming, she has been able to take care of her family and also take care of her parents.

Florence's sources of income are a small side-hustle business (posho mill), vegetables, milk, and egg selling. These products are very perishable and require timely delivery to the market, but one problem that she faces is delivering to the market on time. The Mbururu, Kitale area has a poor road network and poor feeder roads that really hamper timely delivery of products to the market. That is why Florence is kindly seeking a loan to buy a motorbike. Using the motorbike, she will deliver products to the market on time and reap more profits because the products will still be fresh.

Florence is very determined to succeed, and because she is very disciplined with finances, she expects that, through accumulated profits, she will be able to provide a secure future for herself and also for her parents. Florence's dream is to go back to school and she hopes that, through your loan, you will help her realize her dream.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to deliver her farm products to market.

loans.name: Nai's Group

texts.en:
A resident living in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Nai is 29 years old and a married mother of three children who are schoolchildren. She has been growing cassava for 11 years to earn the main source of income. Additionally, she has been working for others for a fee so that she can supplement her family’s income. She can earn income of about 6 USD per day and save around 2 USD each day. This year, the price of cassava is decreasing in the market, which is the main challenge for her business. Now she is leading a group of two members to apply for a Kiva loan via VisionFund in order to save her business.

This will be her fourth loan cycle, while her group’s member is in her fifth loan cycle. The previous loans greatly helped her to afford to buy household supplies. As the group leader, she will manage her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and pesticide to grow her crop well. She hopes to get more outputs to earn more income so that she can expand her current business and upgrade the living standard.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticide to grow her crop well to get more outputs so that she can expand her current business.

loans.name: Shatha

texts.en:
Shatha is a 23-year-old single lady who lives in Irbid. Her father is divorced from her mother and left them without any income for ‎her family and because of that, Shatha is a very hard worker and helpful lady. She decided to work as a security woman in one of ‎the malls that is located in Irbid to help her mother with the household expenses and improve the standard of living for her siblings.

‎Shatha finished her high school degree and went to the university to achieve her dreams. Now she is a student in the university, ‎majoring in civil engineering in her last year and she hopes to find good work after she graduates. Because of the ‎financial crises that she and her family is facing, she applied for a loan to help cover her semester fees.‎

loans.use: To help cover her semester fees.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Fifteen years ago, Nasreen, who is 35 years of age now, started a small tuition center with the support of her husband (also shown in the photo). With the passage of time it gained popularity. Nasreen has decided to upgrade her tuition center into a low-cost private school.

There are 450 students in her school, 43% of whom are female. When asked what motivates her, Nasreen replied, “my parents struggled to keep me in school when I was young. We lacked resources and they could not afford to send me to a good school, but they never compromised on education. Today when I teach students I feel that I am enabling the youth of a rural community to change and secure a better future in the long run.” Nasreen has requested PKR 140,000 to construct a few rooms along with paying for some repair work for her school.

loans.use: to construct a few rooms along with paying for some repair work in her school.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina, 57 years old, has taken on the responsibility to raise her four children after the death of her husband in 1995. The income generated to fulfill her family's needs is coming from a small business Paulina operates wholeheartedly. Paulina sells different things (which are mostly demanded by her customers) such as yellow rice, cendol (a beverage made with such droplets mixed with coconut milk and palm sugar), fried banana, donuts, and also bath stuff. In order to raise a stable income, Paulina always prices her handmade things at a standard price so that even children can afford to buy them.

As one of the existing clients of TLM, Paulina renewed her loan from the old product to the new product because she needs more capital for her business expansion. She has requested a loan of IDR 2,500,000. This loan will allow Paulina to buy banana, cassava, coconut, palm sugar, vegetables, etc.

loans.use: to buy banana, cassava, coconut, palm sugar, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en: Bonifacia is a mother to two teenagers aged 17 and 18. She and her husband live in Badian, Cebu. For two decades, she has been dependent on her hog-raising business to earn a living. It's not easy for her, especially during times when she runs out of feed. She sometimes resorts to giving her hogs leftover foods, chopped banana stem and fruits. Bonifacia is asking for a loan to buy feed so she can give them proper food and fatten them in four months. Bonifacia plans to expand her business and take in more piglets to raise to maximize her income.

loans.use: to buy feed

loans.name: Cresenciana

texts.en:
Cresenciana is 63 years old and married with five children. Cresenciana works very hard to provide for them.

Cresenciana runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, snack foods, eggs, bread, shampoo and other personal care products.

Cresenciana has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Cresenciana would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, snack foods, eggs, bread, shampoo and other personal care products

loans.name: Deffel

texts.en:
Deffel is a single woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Deffel is 32 years old and has three children who are presently in school.

Deffel has a butcher shop business in the Philippines. Deffel requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy pork and meat to sell to her local market.

Deffel has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy pork and meat to sell to her local market

loans.name: Uris Ivette

texts.es:
Uris, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en una embotelladora y tienen un hijo que estudia preparatoria. 

Uris, tiene un cafetin en la escuela de la comunidad desde hace un año, la escuela está a una cuadra de su casa y su horario de venta es de 6:30 a.m. a 5:00 p.m. y tiene varias personas que le ayudan a vender. 

Uris, necesita el préstamo para comprar un par de novillas, para crecerla y luego poder venderlas.

Los sueños de Uris, son mantener su negocio y hacerlo más grande; y también desea construir de bloque su cafetín, porque actualmente es de láminas.
texts.en:
Uris, 37, studied until the sixth grade and is in a relationship. Her partner works at a bottling company and they have a son who is studying in elementary school.

Uris has had a little shop in the community school for a year now. The school is a block from her house and her opening hours are from 6:30am to 5:00pm. She has several people who help her in the shop.

Uris needs the loan to buy a couple of young female cows, to raise and later sell.

Uris' dreams are to maintain and grow her business, as well as to build her shop out of cinderblocks, because currently it is made of metal sheeting.

loans.use: to buy a couple of young female cows, to raise and later sell them.

loans.name: Yonah

texts.en: Yonah is a 36-year-old, hardworking, married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He runs a retail shop and has been doing this business for over nine years. With the profits, he has been able to care for his family and pay school fees for his children. He started with a smaller shop and has now expanded significantly so that he sometimes sells to other retailers. His dream is to expand his shop into a wholesale store, but his is limited by too little capital. He needs a loan to buy more cooking oil, rice, and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cooking oil, rice, and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Sokmeng's Group

texts.en:
Sokmeng, 52, is a farmer living in a bedroom house located in Prey Veng province. She has five children, one of whom is depending on her. She struggles for a living via growing rice for 33 years. Catching fish is her additional source of income. The crop has been threatened by drought; she couldn’t get good yields and she could earn less income than before.

This is Sokmeng's first loan cycle with VisionFund to support her business. Sokmeng is leading a group of two to buy seed, fertilizer and pay for labor fees to grow her crop fruitfully. She hopes that this loan will enable her to gain more outputs as well as the income to save for future needs.

loans.use: To buy seed and fertilizer to grow her crop fruitfully, which will enable her to gain more outputs as well as the income to save for future needs.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Ny

texts.en:
Ny is a 43-year-old married woman with four children. She is a farmer on a rice field which is far away from her house. Her husband is also a farmer. They can only make $5 USD per day to support their family. Ny resides in a rural area of Prey Chhor District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in this career for nearly 23 years now.

Because it is hard to find a place to go to the toilet, she decided to apply for a Kiva loan through HKL to build a hygienic latrine for her house. She is very happy with this loan, since it will promote her health, the environment, and her living standards. She would like to thank all of the lenders for their generosity.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for her house

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en: Nenita is a 55-year-old married woman. Nenita has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy textile, thread, needle, cloth and maintenance for her sewing machine. Nenita has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy textile, thread, needle, cloth and maintenance for her tailoring machine.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 59 years old and married with ten children.

Delia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, snack foods, eggs, bread, shampoo and other personal care products.

Delia has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 18 years and also earns an income from buying and selling bananas.

Delia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, noodles, snack foods, eggs, bread, shampoo and other personal care products

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
Salome is a 27-year-old woman with a great future ahead of her. She is a mother of two who has been running a small-scale mixed farm in Kenya for 10 years. Her primary income sources are maize, vegetables, and profits from a small-time personal business.

Salome is seeking a loan to purchase modern farming implements. She realized that she is working increasingly longer and harder on her farm. Therefore, the tools smallholder women farmer use are of great importance for improving productivity and yields and reducing time and physical effort. There are health implications as well in using poor traditional tools.

The increased income from the use of better tools will help her meet business-related expenses. When asked, "How will this loan benefit your family?" Salome replied, "I will be able to educate my children."

loans.use: To buy farm implements.

loans.name: Shamillah

texts.en:
Shamillah is a hardworking woman with two children, living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She used her previous loan to buy tables, chairs and food for her restaurant. She still runs the hotel and she is progressing. Apart from that, she is also investing in agriculture to increase her earnings. The good mother that she is, she desires to educate her children, buy a plot of land and build a permanent house for a residence. Shamillah’s main hardships are weather changes that lead to low food production, hence high costs of food from farmers. This can lead to low profits and inadequate capital to meet the increasing demands.

Shamillah is requesting a loan to buy modern utensils like refrigerators, food and crates of drinks for her restaurant.

loans.use: to  buy modern utensils like refrigerators, food and crates of drinks for her restaurant.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en: Farzana is a 43-year-old housewife living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her family is comprised of her husband and three children. Her husband is a driver by profession and owns a taxi but the taxi is no longer in operational condition. It needs to be repaired in the near future so his wife Farzana applied for the loan amount of PKR 50,000. This will help her husband to get his taxi repaired before it is too late. She is very happy with the Kiva platform and appreciates it, along with the efforts of BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi

loans.name: Sombo's Group

texts.en:
Originally from Tbaung Khmum province, Sombo is 45 years old and a married mother of three children. The main sources of her family’s income are from rice growing and cassava for ages. Moreover, she has been working for others for a fee to get additional income. The farming business didn’t go well which resulted in her getting less output than before.

This is Sombo's first loan with VisionFund to save her businesses. The loan will be used to buy organic fertilizers, which are expected to enhance the crop's productivity. She hopes to get high yields so that she can sell them for good profits to upgrade her family’s living.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers, which are expected to enhance the crop's productivity.

location.town: Tbaung Khmum District, Tbaung Khmum Province

loans.name: Tangim

texts.en:
Being a farmer in the rice field near her house, Tangim is a 49-year-old married woman with six children, three of whom are married. Her husband is also a farmer. They can only make $5 USD per day to support their family. Tangim resides in a rural area of Preah Netr Preah District, Banteay Meanchey Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in this career for nearly 25 years now.

Because it is hard to find a place to go to the toilet, she decided to apply for a Kiva loan through HKL to build a hygienic latrine for her house. She is very happy with this loan, since it will promote her health, the environment, and her living standard. She would like to thank all the lenders for their generosity.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for her house

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is a married woman, 50 years old.

Nida has a salted egg making business in the Philippines. Nida requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more eggs, salt and other materials for her business.

Nida has been in this business for five years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more eggs, salt and other materials for her business

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is 45 years old, is separated from her husband, and lives in the city outskirts. Being a single mother, she had to fend for her self and the children in order to survive in  the rather expensive city. She had a relative who was selling green bananas and introduced her to the business. She started slowly by selling them in small heaps and has now graduated to selling sacks of the bananas. 
She also makes a living selling costume jewelry and has several years of experience in this field. Her business is located in her home. 
She is asking for the loan in order to boost the business by buying more stock of the matoke (cooking bananas) so that she can increase her sales and profit.
She hopes this will help her to save enough money to pay for her son who will be joining secondary school next year. In this way, she will be able to continue working and growing the business.

loans.use: To buy stock of matoke (cooking bananas) to sell.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en: Marivic is thirty-one years old and engages in raising hogs. She takes care of them by providing them enough feed, giving them a bath with the water hose, and ensuring that her pigs are under a shade to prevent too much heat from reaching them. She is applying for a loan to buy feed for her hogs. Once her pigs are fattened, it will lead to an increase in her income since buyers prefer healthy-looking hogs. The profit generated will be used for the school fees of her children aged 10 and 12.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Sulaiman

texts.en:
Sulaiman is a hard-working, married man with two children and they all attend primary school. They live in Kamwenge, Uganda.

Sulaiman used his previous loan to buy more maize, ground nuts, and coffee to sell. He still deals in produce, selling maize, ground nuts, and coffee as his main source of income, in addition to motorcycle (boda boda) transport, where he earns additional income.

Sulaiman started this business to sustain his family. He currently faces challenges of weather changes, along with pests and diseases that affect his produce business. Since it is a seasonal kind of business, he has a problem of lack of adequate capital to meet the increasing demands.

Sulaiman still has a vision of expanding his business into new markets. He is requesting a loan to buy more maize and coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize  and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Sahib Jan

texts.en: Sahib Jan is a housewife, age 56, living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is living with her husband who is a tailor by profession and his services are admired by his customers. He has been into this line of tailoring for 12 years now.  Sahib Jan's husband wanted to invest in his business by buying various items to help him with his services and becoming efficient enough to complete his orders on time. Sahib is much obliged to the Kiva team and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To invest in the tailoring services of her husband

loans.name: Sangita's Group

texts.en:
Sangita, standing on the right hand side in the photograph, is a 29-year-old simple and humble lady living with her parents in the village of Korba in Chattisgarh, India. Sangita is a divorcee with one son in her care.

She is engaged in the activity of making incense sticks, and she sells these sticks directly to the shopkeepers in the market. She started this business four years back when her family's economic condition was not good and her father was overburdened with family responsibility.

She has a plan to expand her business of making incense sticks by making them in large quantity and supplying them to the big dealers. She also wants to give training in making incense sticks to the girls of her village to make them self-employed. She, along with her group member, has requested a loan amount of 30,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. Sangita will use her portion of the loan amount for purchasing glue, sticks, raw materials for covering the sticks, fragrance, wrapping bags, etc.

She has a dream of running a training school for making incense sticks, supporting her father economically and providing the best education to her son.

loans.use: to purchase glue, sticks, raw materials for covering the sticks, fragrance, and wrapping bags

loans.name: Mauda

texts.en:
Mauda is a hardworking, single mother of one child living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She operates a depot which she started with a little savings from a village bank. She has sole responsibility for her child and the other dependents she lives with.  She also desires to expand her business. Mauda has been challenged by inadequate capital and defaulting customers in her business which affects her final returns.
She is requesting a loan to buy more crates of soda, wine, and spirits to sell.

loans.use: to buy more crates of soda, wine, and spirits to sell.

loans.name: Aramayis

texts.en:
Aramayis lives in Dilijan city with his wife, son and daughter (both of them are school-aged). Aramayis has no higher education but he manages to cover his family's needs through his work at the gas station. He has worked here over five years. Aramayis' wife works at a tourism agency.

Aramayis' work ethic is very strong and he has no holidays or fixed working time and this kind of work already managed to have a bad impact on the state of his health. This loan amount of 750,000 Armenian drams Aramayis is asking for, as he must pay for his medical examination that he plans to pass in order to find out the reason for his unhealthy and weak feeling.

loans.use: to pay for his medical examination that he plans to pass in order to find out the reason for his unhealthy and weak feeling.

loans.name: Beverlyn

texts.en:
Beverlyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Beverlyn is 47 years old and two of her children are still in school.

Beverlyn has a weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy abacca and silk and pay for maintenance for her weaving business.

Beverlyn has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy abacca, silk and maintenance for her weaving business

loans.name: Mathias

texts.en:
Mathias lives in Kamwenge, Uganda and practices farming. He used his previous loan to buy manure for his farm.  He started this business with the intention of improving his standard of living and looking after his family.  Mathias also earns additional income from selling produce like dry maize, rice, and coffee.  He still faces challenges of price fluctuations, bad weather and pests & diseases.  Mathias hopes to become self-sustaining and rich.  

He is requesting a loan to buy manure and pesticides for his farm.

loans.use: to buy manure and pesticides for his farm.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.en:
Ismael wants to thank KIVA and its lenders for their continuous support on his livelihood. The loans granted to him have enabled him to properly maintain his tricycle which allows him stable income to provide for his family.  

Once again he trusts that you will lend him funds in the amount of Php 20000 to pay for new tires, oil, and a battery of his tricycle. He values  his transportation business because it is his only source of income to feed his family of three and send his children to school. 

Ismael aims to acquire one more tricycle to improve his income and be able to continue to send his children to school. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God he studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance for his tricycle.

loans.name: Barcelisa

texts.en:
Barcelisa is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She has a fish business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more sea foods to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like farming sugarcane.

Barcelisa dreams that one day, She will be able to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more sea food to sell to customers.

loans.name: Kumrije

texts.en:
Kumrije is a very hard-working woman who works a lot in order to offer her children a better life. Her three children are between the ages of 11 and 19 years old.

She currently has two jobs, working as a cleaner in a hospital and working three times a week as a babysitter. Her husband works in construction, based on when he is able to find work to be done. His job is not steady nor reliable at this time.

Kumrije is requesting a loan for EUR 800 (Euros), so that she can purchase a big cleaning machine, so that she can start working as a contracted house and business cleaner. She is hoping this will be the first step towards starting her own cleaning company.

Since her goal is to give her children a better education and, thereby, a better future, she is willing to work really hard to achieve them.

loans.use: to purchase a big cleaning machine, so that she can start working as a contracted house and business cleaner.

loans.name: Khikmatulo

texts.ru: Хикматуло 57 лет. Он житель района Хуросон. У него одна дочка и двое сыновья. Дочка учится в университете. Один сын занимается таксистом. Младший сын  учится в средней школе. Хикматуло сильный дехканин. Он 29 лет занимается земледелием на районе. Его труд приносят пользу и доход в семье. Хикматуло только учился в средней школе, и у него среднее образование. Он хочет, чтобы его дочка училась и стала образованной девушкой.  Хикматуло сам заботится о своих детях. Он любить свою семью, и ради них он трудиться. Хикматуло обратился за кредитом целью оплатить на обучения дочери. У него не хватает денег и решил за счет кредита собрать достаточную сумму денег. Хикматулло очень нуждается на Вашу помощью.
texts.en: Khikmatulo is 57 and a resident  of the Khuroson district.  He has one daughter and two sons.  His daughter is a university student.  One of his sons works as a taxi driver while the youngest still attends secondary school.  Khikmatulo is a strong man and a farmer; he has been working in agriculture in his own district for the past 29 years.  His work supports his family and brings an income home.  Khikmatulo only attended school up to secondary school and has the equivalent of a high school education.  He wants his daughter to be able to study, so that she can become an educated young woman.  Khikmatulo takes care of his children alone.  He loves his family and works very hard for them.  He has requested a loan in order to pay for his daughter's education.  He doesn't have enough resources, so he has decided to take a loan to gather the money that he needs. He relies on your help.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's studies.

loans.name: Kalonbi

texts.ru: Простоя женщина Калонби. Ей  45 лет. Она замужем за простого дехканина. Калонби вместе пережили много бед и радостных событий вместе и воспитали четверых детей. Калонби помогает мужу в посеве и сборе урожая. А ее муж помогает ей в работе в скотном дворе. Вот так с поддержкой друг друга они живут много лет. У семьи Калонби финансовое положение не самое лучшее и чтобы вернуть стабильность Калонби планирует расширить животноводческую деятельность путем увеличения поголовья скотов. А ее муж уже начал посев урожая. Калонби надеется, что ее семью поддержат и их финансовое положение стабилизуется. Калонби просит кредит для купли несколько скота.
texts.en: Kalonbi is a modest 45-year-old woman married to a simple farmer.  She and her husband have endured many difficult times together but also known many joys while raising their four children.  Kalonbi helps her husband with planting crops and harvesting.  In return, her husband helps her with the livestock. They have supported each other for many years.  Kalonbi's financial situation is not the best and, in order to restore some financial stability, she is planning to increase her livestock headcount and expand her animal husbandry business.  As for her husband, he has already started to plant crops towards a new season.  Kalonbi would like to receive some support for her family and hopes that her financial situation will improve.  She is taking this loan to buy a few head of livestock.

loans.use: to buy a few head of livestock.

loans.name: Ugiloy

texts.ru: Сельское хозяйство является одним из самых трудных рабочих мест, потому что это занимает много тяжелой работы, чтобы двигаться вперед. Но Угилой никогда не отказалась, несмотря на плохую погоду или на то другое. Она всегда готова найти способ, чтобы обеспечить свою семью. Угилой прекрасная женщина. Ей 44 года. Она живет вместе семьей на районе Кубадиен. Она встает с первыми лучами солнца отправиться в земельный участок, где она имеет обязательства работы. У нее есть собственный земельный участок, где она выращивает пшеница и семечки. Угилой хотелось обработать урожай и почву минеральными удобрениями, чтобы уничтожать микробы и насекомые. Для приобретения минеральных удобрений ей нужно Ваша поддержка. Она нуждается на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Agriculture is one of the most difficult jobs on earth because it requires a lot of very hard work to move things forward. Ugiloy never gives up, though, even in the face of fierce weather or other difficulty.  She is always ready to find a way to support her family.  She is a lovely 44-year-old woman who lives with her family in the Qubadiyon district of Tajikistan.  She gets up as soon as the sun rises and goes straight to her land where work awaits her.  She has her own piece of land on which she grows wheat and sunflowers.  She wants to get ready for the next harvest and prepare her soil with mineral fertilizers so that she can get rid of microbes and insects.  She needs your support to purchase these mineral fertilizers.  She relies on your help.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Khursheed

texts.en:
Khursheed is the age of 47 and living with her family in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband just set up a mobile phone shop near his home. He offers various types of phones and accessories and provides a recharge facility. He has attained a list of customers in just a few days.

Now he is facing a problem due to the lack of availability of funds because he wants to increase the mobile phone accessories, which are very popular and costly nowadays. He just began this business.

This is the reason Khursheed contacted Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan and requested a loan. With the help of the loan; her husband can easily purchase mobile phone accessories and extra recharge units for various networks. In this way; he can easily attract more customers, can generate more and does not have to have further cash in hand to purchased the desired inventories to generate income to cherish his family.

Khursheed would be very thankful to such lenders who take an active part in funding this loan.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone accessories and extra recharge units for various networks for her husband's new mobile phone shop.

loans.name: Chamrin Bai

texts.en:
Chamrin Bai is 36 years old and hails from a small village of Korba, Chattisgarh, India. She lives in her own house with her life companion and her two children ages 12 and 14 years old. She is a hardworking woman who, due to her friendliness, has many customers who visit her business where she sells fruit and vegetables.

One factor that concerns her is that she does not have access to a hygienic latrine at her home. She has to walk long distances to relieve herself and is vulnerable to crimes and molestations. In order to restore her privacy, she needs to build a toilet at her home.

Therefore, Chamrin Bai is requesting a loan amount of 15,000 INR. She will use the loan amount to install a toilet in her home so that she will no longer have to depend on an open field for defecation and enjoy her share of privacy.

Chamrin Bai is eagerly awaiting for your kind help and support.

loans.use: to install a toilet in her home

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en: Gabriel, age 30, is married with two children and both attend school in Hoima, Uganda. He deals in produce, primarily buying and selling maize and beans alongside farming cassava. He started his business in order to raise income to support his family. He desires to develop and expand his business more as well as educate his children. However, inadequate capital and price fluctuations hinder his desires. He is seeking credit to buy more maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize and beans to sell

loans.name: Tarxan

texts.en: Tarxan is a farmer and he is 44 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and two children in Fuzuli region. His son is into sports and his daughter goes to 10th class. They are IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city. Tarxan has a few cows and he has been in the animal breeding business for five years. He loves his job and wants to go forward in this job.Today he needs his first loan in the amount of 1,900 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat).  With this loan, he wants to buy two head of cattle. He says he is greatly thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for the help.

loans.use: to buy two head of cattle

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуда  из Спитамен. Она замужем, и на районе живет вместе семьей. Ее муж находится на заработках вдали от семьи. Мавлуде всего 23 года и она дехканка. Очень мало встречаются такую дехканку в таком юном возрасте. Дехканы очень трудолюбивые, и они любить зарабатывать своим честно нажитым трудом. У Мавлуде есть собственный земельный участок, на который она трудиться уже 5 лет. Мавлуда параллельно занимается животноводством. Мавлуда получила этот опыт от родителей, она очень благодарна им. Она хочет получить богатый урожай и старается всеми способами. Для этой цели она просит кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений. Мавлуда верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Mavluda comes from Spitamen.  She is married and lives with her family in her own district.  Her husband is a migrant worker and lives far from the family.  Mavluda is only 23 years old and already a farmer, which is quite rare as very few people of her age choose that field of work.  Farmers are very hardworking people who love to make a living thanks to their honest and difficult labor.  Mavluda has a small piece of land that she has been cultivating for the past five years already.  She is also involved in animal husbandry.  She acquired her experience from her parents and feels very grateful to them.  She is trying very hard to get a good yield.  She is taking this loan to buy mineral fertilizers.  She is confident that she will receive your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Neang

texts.en:
Neang, 58 years old, is a farmer on a rice field who lives in Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham Province. She is a hardworking mother of six children, four of whom are married. Her husband is also a farmer. This couple can make a net profit of approximately USD 5 a day.

During this time, Neang is facing a financial issue in her family. She needs some money to buy a horse to transport small goods for her husband, but yet she can’t afford to do so. Therefore, now she would like to get a Kiva loan. She has decided to apply for a Kiva loan to help them. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a horse to transport small goods for her husband.

loans.name: Ana Cirila

texts.en:
Ana Cirila is a 57-year-old married woman who resides in the town of Dumanjug, Cebu. She is married and has five children. Her youngest child is 12. Two of her children are still attending school.

She earns a living by selling bananas, which she also sells for snack food when ripe. This snack food is known as "banana cue" (deep fried banana with caramelized sugar on a bamboo skewer).
She also engages is a dried fish vending business and raises hogs, too. She sells dried fish to the locals in her place.

She has requested a loan to buy more supplies of bananas, dried fish and piglets. In that way, her sources of income will improve. These will boost her daily income causing her to continue to cater to the needs of her respective customers and slowly gain higher earnings.

Ana Cirila is determined that she will become successful by expanding her livelihood and continuing to support the needs of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy more supplies of bananas, dried fish and piglets.

loans.name: April

texts.en:
April is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with four children.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her business.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like raising livestock.

April dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is 53 years old. She lives in Dilijan city with her daughter who is 20 years old and a student at Yerevan State University in the faculty of Armenian History. She studies at the paid division.

Gohar has a vocational medical education and for several years she worked as a nurse. Now she works for a private company and manages work that is different from her profession. She works a lot and spends her income very carefully since she has a great problem to solve: her daughter's tuition fee.

Gohar hopes that this time Kiva lenders will help her to solve this problem; this loan of 200.000 Armenian drams she is asking for, together with her saved money, will be enough to pay her daughter's tuition fee for the whole year.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's tuition fee for the whole year.

loans.name: Fama Mu Mag's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est constitué de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et ont comme activité principale le commerce, elles sont solidaires entre elles. La responsable Khaïta L'emprunteur en vedette est âgée de 51 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants. Elle vend divers produits qu'elle achète au grand marché de sa localité. Sur la photo elle est debout à droite habillé en couleur orange avec écharpe bleu. Elle est très connue dans le quartier, elle revend sans problème. Avec son prêt elle compte investir tout son prêt pour acheter .(savons, lait de beauté, parfum, encens, bijoux, habillement pour enfants. Avec ses bénéfices elle prend en charge ses enfants et aide son mari dans la gestion de la famille
texts.en:
This group is made up of women who all live in the same neighborhood and whose main business is commerce. They are very supportive of each other.

The leader, Khaïta, who is the featured borrower, is 51. She is married and the mother of five children. She sells various products that she buys in the big marketplace of her locality. In the photo she is standing on the right, dressed in orange with a blue scarf. She is well-known in the area and is able to make sales without problems.

With her loan, she is planning to buy soap, beauty cream, perfume, incense, costume jewelry, and clothing for children. With her profits she will care for her children and help her husband to manage the family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase soap, beauty cream, perfume, incense, costume jewelry, and clothing for children for resale.

loans.name: Jose Willian

texts.es:
José es una persona que se encuentra soltera, no tiene hijos ni ayuda económica del extranjero, los únicos que dependen de él son  sus padres, como una forma de generar ingresos se decidió a vender prendas de vestir, su jornada de labores es de seis de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, desempeñando esta actividad puede tener el sustento diario para su grupo familiar.
Solicita un crédito en Padecomsm para tener un inventario renovado, comprara camisas, blusas, pantalones, chores, etc., con ello tendrá la oportunidad de atender las demandas que hacen sus clientes, considerando que obtendrá la mercadería a buen precio sus ganancias serán mejores y así podrá cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
Su sueño es tener un negocio más competitivo para atraer a nuevos clientes y cancelar sus deudas.
texts.en:
Jose is single. He has no children and receives no help from abroad. Jose's only dependents are his parents. In order to earn an income, Jose decided to sell clothes. He works from 6am to 4pm with a view to supporting his family.

Jose is applying for a loan from Padeconmsm in order to have more stock. He will buy shirts, blouses, trousers, shorts and more to cover customer demand. As Jose will be buying stock at a good price, he will earn higher profits and will be able to pay for necessities for his family.

Jose's dream is to have a more competitive business, attract new customers, and pay off his debts.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, trousers, shorts and more to cover customer demand.

loans.name: Luis Ernesto

texts.es: Luis es un hombre trabajador de 36 años de edad que vive con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 15 y 8 años de edad que se encuentran estudiando con su apoyo. Desde muy pequeño Luis aprendió a cultivar la tierra, sembrando granos básicos y legumbres como: mora, rábano, chipilín entre otros, además presta sus servicios como electricista obteniendo mejores ingresos. Luis desea reparar el corredor de su vivienda y el cuarto de la cocina, por lo cual solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre para reparar el corredor y el cuarto de la cocina de su hogar.
texts.en:
Luis, 36, is a hard-working man who lives with his partner and two children aged 15 and eight. Both children are still in education and supported by their father.

From being a young boy, he has had the skills to work the land, sewing basic grains and vegetables such as blackberries, radishes, herbs and much more. He also works as an electrician to generate an additional income.

He would like to repair the hallway in his home, as well as the kitchen. Therefore, he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to buy corrugated sheets, wood, nails and wire so he can make these improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials to repair parts of his home.

loans.name: Johana Andrea

texts.es:
Johana es una hermosa joven de 26 años de edad, ella es muy aplicada, presta servicio de peluquería, actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para pagar un curso de químicos 2  dictado por la corporación Interactuar, para complementar sus conocimientos en belleza y certificarse para aplicar tratamientos en cabello.
Su sueño es estudiar artesa, lleva dos años ahorrando para lograr este objetivo y quiere seguir luchando día a día para hacerlo realidad.
texts.en:
Johana is a beautiful 26-year-old woman. She is dedicated, and provides hairdressing services. She is currently applying for a loan in order to pay for a level two chemistry course being offered by Interactuar. This course will help Johana to develop her knowledge of beauty treatments and qualify her to offer certain hairdressing services.

Johana's dream is to study hard. She has been saving up for two years to achieve this objective and wants to continue working hard every day in order to make this dream a reality.

loans.use: to pay for a level two chemistry course for beauty treatments.

loans.name: Paula Andrea

texts.es:
Paula es una mujer de 28 años de edad que se dedica a prestar servicios de estilista, la historia de esa mujer es una historia inspiradora, de una mujer que realizo múltiples trabajos para poder montar su negocio, compraba las cosas poco a poco y aunque no cuenta con un salón de belleza bien dotado, tiene lo elemental para prestar un servicio de calidad.
Actualmente la cliente solicita un préstamo para pagar un curso y certificación en químicos 2, con el propósito de aprender todo acerca de los tratamientos capilares.
Paula quiere capacitarse para adquirir nueva clientela, necesita más recursos para tener una calidad de vida y asegurar la educación de su pequeño.
texts.en:
Paula is 28 years old. She works as a stylist. She is an inspiring woman who used to work in various jobs in order to start her own business. She gradually bought what she needed, and, although her beauty salon is not particularly well-equipped, she has what she needs to offer quality service.

Paula is currently applying for a loan in order to pay for a level two chemistry course and learn about skin treatments.

Paula wants to do training in order to attract more customers. She needs a higher income in order to enjoy a better quality of life and guarantee her young child an education.

loans.use: to pay for a level two chemistry course for beauty treatments.

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es:
Verónica se dedica  a vender tamales como medio de subsistencia, lo fundó de manera independiente hace tres años, el oficio lo heredo de su familia, ella es casada, vive con su esposo y tres e hijos, junto a su pareja luchan por sacar adelante a su familia y brindarles a sus hijos mejores oportunidades de desarrollo.
En busca de atender a más clientes y ofrecerles productos de calidad, ella invertirá el crédito en la compra de maíz, pollo, condimentos, hojas de huerta, aceite, papas, etc., para abastecer su inventario e incrementar la producción de tamales, así podrá tener clientes satisfechos con lo que espera que las ventas e ingresos aumenten para resarcir la deuda adquirida.
Sus aspiraciones son ser una persona ejemplar en su comunidad, continuar trabajando para salir adelante y ayudar a sus hijos a que se puedan superar.
texts.en:
Veronica sells tamales to make a living. She set up on her own three years ago, following in the footsteps of other family members in this business.

She is married and lives with her husband and three children. Together they strive to raise their children so that they can grow up enjoying a good quality of life.

In order to serve more customers and offer high quality food, she wants to invest the loan in ingredients such as chicken, condiments, salad leaves, oil, potatoes and things like that. This will stock her business up and help her increase her production.

This should lead to more customers, which will generate more income and allow her to pay off the loan.

She tries to be an exemplary person in the community, and would like to carry on with her business so she can help her children grow up.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make her 'tamales'.

loans.name: William Alfredo

texts.es:
William es un hombre de 45 años de edad, una persona tranquila, despreocupada, vive en unión libre con su pareja, no tiene hijos, genera recursos vendiendo pescado en el municipio de San Antonio de Palmito.
Inicio su negocio por necesidad económica, vive una zona de postconflicto, casi no hay oportunidades laborales, los habitantes salen adelante más por su iniciativa y proyección hacia el emprendimiento.
William siempre busca mejorar como empresario, pero la falta de recursos le impide vender y crecer como empres.
Pensando en su crecimiento y en el aumento en ventas, William quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de alevines y alimento, esto le permitirá tener mayor cantidad de animales para la venta.
texts.en:
William, 45, is a laid-back person, who tries not to get stressed with life. He lives with his partner. They don't have any children. He earns a living by fishing in the local town of San Antonio de Palmito.

He started his business because he needed the money. He lives in an area devastated by conflict and there are not many work opportunities. The people in the area get along by using their own initiative and entrepreneurial spirit more than anything else.

William always tries to improve his business but he lacks the resources to generate sales and grow. To rectify this, he would like to use a loan to buy small fish and bait. This will allow him to catch more fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy small fish and bait so he can catch more fish.

loans.name: Nely De Los Angeles

texts.es: La vivienda en la que vive Nely es muy humilde y en ella habita junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 17 y 20 años de edad. Ella es una mujer admirable que cada día se gana la vida por medio de su cultivo de mora, güisquil y rábano, lo cual le permite sacar adelante a su familia, con mucho esfuerzo. Nely desea comprar mayor cantidad de semillas y fertilizantes para que sus cultivos sean mejores, por lo cual solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: semillas, fertilizantes y abono para sus cultivos, y de esta manera obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Nely lives in a modest home with her husband and two children aged 17 and 20.

She deserves respect because every day she earns her own living growing blackberries, chayotes and radishes. This hard work gives her an income so she can support her family.

She is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy a greater number of seeds and also to purchase fertilizers and other agricultural supplies so that her crops are of a better quality. This will boost her sales in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to boost sales.

loans.name: Rene Arnoldo

texts.es:
Rene es acompañado, en la actualidad vive con su pareja y sus hijos, su negocio consiste en brindar el servicio de transporte, ya tiene cinco años de experiencia por lo que es reconocido en su localidad como una persona honesta y responsable.
Su negocio demanda un equipo de trabajo en buen estado, por lo que solicita un crédito para  pagar el mantenimiento de su vehículo, de esta manera  brindara seguridad y mejor atención a sus clientes, el objetivo de la inversión es incrementar sus ingresos para tener mejor calidad de vida familiar.
La visión de Rene es continuar trabajando para tener un buen desarrollo en la sociedad así como también para ser un ejemplo de honestidad y responsabilidad  para que sus hijos sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Rene is married and lives with wife and children. He runs a transport business, which he has had for five years now. He is well-known in his area as being a responsible and honest worker.

For his business to run successfully, he needs his vehicle to be in a good condition. Therefore, he is asking for a loan to carry out maintenance on it. This will allow him to offer a more reliable and safer service to his customers.

He hopes that this will lead to more income so he can improve the quality of life of his family.

He would like to grow as a business and have more influence in society, as well as giving his children a good example to follow as they grow up.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es:
Con el objetivo de actualizarse en nuevas tendencias en químicos y todo lo relacionado con salón de belleza la señora Gloria quiere solicitar un préstamo para pagar un curso dictado por la corporación Interactuar de químicos 2. 
Ella es una mujer de 37 años de edad, madre de dos hijos de 10 y 16 y que cuenta con una empleada, una mujer guerrera, combativa que lucho varios años para montar su peluquería, no se dejó vencer por las dificultades económicas y sobresalió de todos los problemas.
Ahora que cuenta con mayor estabilidad, Gloria quiere cuidar lo que con tanto esfuerzo ha logrado, actualizando sus conocimientos en el área para transmitirlos en su negocio prestando un servicio.
texts.en:
Gloria, 37, is the mother of two children aged 10 and 16. She is a hard-working woman who fought hard to set up her own hairdressers'. She never gave up. Despite struggling to find the money, she was able to overcome all the obstacles that were set before her.

Her business is now much more stable and she wants to keep it that way. That is why she would like to expand her knowledge in her area so that she can offer more services in her salon.

Therefore, she is asking for a loan to pay for a second course on chemical treatments, so that she can learn the latest techniques to put into practice in her beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy fees for a beauty course.

loans.name: Elia

texts.es: Elia  de 25 años es una mujer muy emprendedora ya que desde hace 10 años aproximadamente se dedica a la cría de cerdos y apicultura junto a su esposo, con los recursos obtenidos de esta labor logra mantener su casa y darles todo lo que este a su alcance a sus dos pequeños hijos. Ella desea seguir esforzándose y trabajando más para que sus hijos puedan tener una buena educación y ser personas de bien a su comunidad y país. En la comunidad de Atlántida, Honduras donde Elia y su familia viven no tienen acceso a energía eléctrica, por lo cual las tareas y labores diarias como tener mejor iluminación, cargas de celulares o simplemente tener un momento de esparcimiento se les dificulta debido a esto. Elia piensa darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposo, por esta razón solicita a Soluz Honduras un préstamo con el que podrá adquirir un Sistema solar que le ayudara a ella y su familia a tener mejor iluminación, acceso a cargar sus teléfonos celulares y ahorro en compras de velas y lámparas a base de querosén, asimismo cuando sus hijos tengan edad para comenzar a estudiar, no se verán afectados por la falta de iluminación.
texts.en:
Elia is a 25 years old woman. She is very entrepreneurial because she has been breeding pigs and bees during approximately 10 years together with her husband. She manages to keep her house with the income she earns with this work, and to give everything available to her means to her two young children.

She wishes to continue making efforts and working more so that her children can receive a good education and be good people for their communities and country.

They do not have access to electricity in the Atlántida community, Honduras, where Elia and her family live. Therefore, the daily tasks and chores, like having better lighting, charging mobile phones or simply having a recreational moment become complicated for that reason.

Elia wants to give a better quality of life to her children and husband, and for that reason she is requesting a loan to Soluz to buy a solar system that will help her and her family to have better lightning, access to charge their mobile phones and save money in the purchase of candles and kerosene lamps. Moreover, her children will not be affected by the lack of lightning when they will reach the age to start studying.

loans.use: to buy a solar lighting system which will improve the living conditions at her home.

loans.name: Florine Sylvia

texts.fr:
Florine a 31 ans, elle est mariée. Son mari travaille comme docker dans une unité de menuiserie. Le couple a 4  enfants (15-12-10-5 ans) dont 3 scolarisés (le second de 12 ans dans une école privée).
Elle vend divers articles surtout d'habillements depuis 1999. Les articles vendus varient selon la saison. En cette période, ce sont les robes, ensemble, chaussures,  et chaussettes qui sont les plus prisés sur le marché. La réussite d’une telle activité dépend de la connaissance des besoins des clients et du montant du fonds disponible pour la constitution de stocks durant la période où les prix sont réduits. C’est une activité familiale qui constitue la principale source de revenus du ménage  
Une autre activité de la famille est l’élevage. L’objectif est d'augmenter le fonds propre utilisé dans l’activité et d’être autonome. Le couple prévoit la réussite de leurs enfants dans leurs études. Le but est de pouvoir construire une maison  en dur  car la famille habite actuellement dans une maison en bois avec le cheptel bovin pour des raisons de sécurité.
texts.en:
Florine is 31 years old and married. Her husband works as a docker in a carpentry unit. The couple has four children (15, 12, 10 and five years old), three of whom are at school (the second child who is 12 years old is in a private school).

Florine has been selling a variety of products, but principally clothing, since 1999. The articles she sells vary according to the season. During the current period it is dresses, outfits, shoes and socks which are the most popular in the market. The success of such a business depends on the knowledge of the customer's needs and the amount of funds available to build up stock during the period of low prices. This is a family business which constitutes the household's main source of income. The family has another business, raising animals. The aim is to increase the capital used for the business and be autonomous. The couple is providing for their children to succeed in their studies. The goal is to be able to build a concrete house since the family currently lives in a wooden house with the herd of cows for security reasons.

loans.use: to buy dresses, outfits, socks, sandals and caps.

loans.name: Shagufta

texts.en:
Shagufta is a 36-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of five children and equally responsible for all of them. 
She belongs to an ultra-poor family and that is why she cannot afford their educational expenses. So, most of her children are doing jobs as laborers for daily wages. One of her sons goes with his father to help him in his business. Her husband owns a blacksmith shop in which he provides welding services. He also provides door-to-door services to his customers. Due to the increase in the price of iron, he is unable to buy sufficient welding materials such as welding rods, soldering rods, etc. to carry out his business.

To fulfill the demand of his customers and to run his enterprise, he needs some capital to buy welding materials. Shagufta has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband so that he would be able to buy welding rods, soldering rods and iron rods for manufacturing iron accessories.

Shagufta is very glad and thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy welding rods, soldering rods and iron rods for her husband's blacksmith shop.

loans.name: Melani

texts.en:
Melani is 43 years old, married and has five children. Four of whom are enrolled in school.

Melani is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Melani requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Melani has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Melani would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 29 years old, married and a mother of one child. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2014 to benefit from the training, especially enterprise development and financial management.  

Through the training, she has been able to manage her motorbike spare parts shop effectively by keeping proper records.  This loan will help her to buy more motorbike spare parts, hence adding stock to her spare parts selling business. This will enable her to increase her income to support her family’s expenses e.g. food, medical and school fees for her child.

Catherine is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial support; she promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy motorbike spare parts for resale, hence earn more income to support family expenses e.g. food, medical and school fees.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia is a 42-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She requested a loan for her husband’s green grocery business. 

Her husband has been selling vegetables for many years. He sells seasonal fresh vegetables in his hometown. He has been using a four wheel manual cart to carry the vegetables from one place to another. Now he has opened a shop for selling vegetables, but he does not have enough cash-in-hand to buy initial inventories to run his shop in a good manner. His children are growing and their needs are increasing. To cope with the rapid increase in the school fees, books, utility bills and household expenses, he wants to establish his business but he does not have enough savings to buy vegetables in bulk.  

Therefore, Fozia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy fresh and seasonal vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal vegetables for her husband's green grocery business.

loans.name: Dora Elena

texts.es:
Dora es una mujer de 34 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas, es separada y tiene dos hijos de 11 y 14. 
Al separarse de su esposo quedó a cargo de la familia, ella trabaja con mucho esmero y dedicación para generar los recursos suficientes para el sostenimiento de sus seres amados, pero es difícil porque inicio hace poco y no cuenta con el capital suficiente para crecer como empresaria y vender lo que necesita para sobrevivir.
Ella a pesar de las dificultades se proyectó su empresa a futuro, se ve como una gran empresaria, que cuenta con empleados y puestos distribuidor en toda la ciudad y en futuro ojala no próximo, comprando su casa.
Actualmente la cliente se encuentra solicitando su primer crédito el cual será destinado al pago de proveedores de carne, salsas, papas, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Dora is a 34 year old mother, she is separated and has two children aged 11 and 14. She sells fast food.

When she separated from her family she became responsible for the whole family. She works painstakingly and with dedication to generate what she needs to support her loved ones, but it is difficult as she only started recently and she does not have enough capital to grow as a businesswoman and sell what she needs to survive.

Despite these difficulties she is planning for the future of her business. She sees herself as a great businesswoman, with employees, stalls across the city, and at some point in the future, buying her own house.

She is currently requesting her first loan which will be used to pay her suppliers, for meat, salsas, potatoes and other products.

loans.use: to pay her suppliers, for meat, salsas, potatoes and other products.

loans.name: Secundina

texts.es: Secundina es una mujer humilde de 56 años de edad que al lado de su esposo siempre ha trabajado la tierra sosteniendo la economía de su hogar con el cultivo de güisquil, espinaca, ejotes, frijoles y maíz los cuales vende para obtener los ingresos económicos necesarios para sacar adelante a su familia. Ella habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y su hijo. Secundina solicito un crédito anteriormente el cual utilizo para cambiar las láminas de las paredes y el techo de su vivienda, pero ahora solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: abono, fertilizantes y semillas para mejorar sus cultivos y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Secundina is a modest 56-year-old woman who, together with her husband, has always worked the land, supporting her family's finances by growing pear squash, spinach, green beans, kidney beans and corn, which she sells in order to earn the money she needs to support her family. She lives in her own home with her husband and son.

Secundina previously requested a loan, which she used to replace the wall coverings and roof of her home, but is now requesting a new loan from FUSAI to invest in compost, fertilisers and seeds to improve her harvests and her earnings.

loans.use: to invest in compost, fertilisers and seeds to improve her harvests and her earnings.

loans.name: Jorge Segundo

texts.es:
Él es Jorge, un hombre serio, organizado, una persona que le gusta el trabajo independiente, tiene 49 años de edad, es separo, padre de 4 muchachos, los cuales aprecia y trata de ayudarles cada que cuenta con capital.
Actualmente el señor Jorge se encuentra montando un restaurante, quiere incursionar en el mundo de la buena mesa, junto todos su ahorros, consiguió un local, los implementos de cocina, algunos activos pero le resta solo un poco para iniciar su labor.
Con el propósito de iniciar a operar lo antes posible Jorge quiere solicitar un préstamo el cual usara en la compra de mesas y sillas y lo más importante surtido de productos de la canasta familiar para la preparación de almuerzos y desayunos, también invertirá en refrescos.
texts.en:
This is Jorge. He is a serious, organized man, a person who likes to work independently. .He is 49 years old. separated and the father of 4 children, whom he treasures and tries to help every time he has capital.

Now, Jorge is opening a restaurant. He wants to enter into the world of good cuisine. He amassed all his savings and was able to get a locale, kitchen tools, and some assets, but he needs a little more to start work.

In order to start operating as soon as possible, Jorge wants to ask for a loan to use in buying tables, chairs, and the most important thing, which is a selection of staple products to prepare lunches and breakfasts. He will also invest in beverages.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs to start his own business.

loans.name: Ana Griselda

texts.es:
Ana es una productora agrícola de 43 años de edad, mujer suelta, carismática, sencilla, disfruta de su trabajo y su familia, maneja su horario, es una persona liberal que trabaja por cambiar su realidad.
A pesar de vivir en una zona de postconflicto, es una persona perseverante que nunca se rinde, ella quiere ver a su hijo convertirse en un profesional y por ello junto con su esposo hacen grandes esfuerzos para su niño tenga una buena educación y un pensamiento ganador.
Con el firme propósito de crecer y aumentar sus ventas la señora Ana solicita un préstamo para comprar cerdos y materiales para ampliar sus cocheras, para poder ubicar los cerdos.
texts.en:
Ana is a 43 year old agricultural producer. She is a single, charismatic, simple woman who enjoys her work and her family, manages her work schedule and is an open person who is working to change her situation.

Despite living in a post-conflict region, she perseveres and never gives up. She wants to see her son become a professional, so she and her husband are making great efforts to provide their child with a good education and a winning mindset.

With the fixed aim of growing and increasing her sales, Ana is requesting a loan to buy pigs and materials for expanding her barns to provide space for the pigs.

loans.use: to buy pigs and materials for expanding her barns to provide space for the pigs.

loans.name: Sothea

texts.en:
Sothea is a 28-year-old farmer on the cassava farmland who lives in Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham Province. She is a hard-working mother of two children. Her husband, Long, 35, is also a farmer. This couple can make a net profit of approximately USD 5 a day.

During this time, Sothea is facing a financial issue in her family. She needs some money to buy some farming materials, but she can’t afford them.  Therefore, now she has decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy fertilizers and other farming related materials to use in the cassava field. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farming related materials

loans.name: Ma. Lourdes

texts.en:
Ma. Lourdes is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy feed and repair her pig pens.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Ma. Lourdes dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and repair her pig pens.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.es:
Ella es Lilibeth es una mujer campesina, una mujer guerrera, luchadora, pujante. Separada de su esposo, tiene una pequeña de 2 años de edad la cual mantiene junto con el hogar, con un negocio de venta de animales.
Lilibeth inició a tener problemas económicos cuando se separó de su esposo, pero nunca agacho la mirada, por el contrario demostró la calidad de humano que es trabajando a veces a doble jornada solo por llevar ese alimento a la mesa de su hogar.
Ella solo tiene un simple deseo, generar una mejor calidad de vida a sus seres amados y a que su hija nunca le falte nada (alimento, techo, educación).
Actualmente la cliente se encuentra en proceso de crecimiento, ella quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y comprar materiales para remodelar las cocheras, un sí te le presto representara una enorme oportunidad a una empresaria trabajadora, humilde y honesta que piensa primero en su familia que en ella.
texts.en:
This is Lilibeth, a woman from the country with a thriving fighting spirit. She is separated from her husband and has a young two-year-old daughter, who she supports at home. Her business is in animal sales.

Lilibeth started having financial problems when she separated from her husband but she never hung her head. On the contrary, she showed what type of person she is, sometimes working double shifts just so that she could put food on the table at home. Her only wish is to provide a better quality of life for her loved ones and for her daughter never to lack anything (food, a home, education).

Her customer base is currently growing. She wants to request a loan to buy pigs and materials for remodelling her barns. This would be a great opportunity for a hard-working, humble and honest business woman who puts her family before herself.

loans.use: to buy pigs and materials for remodelling her barns.

loans.name: Juntas Y Unidas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JUNTAS Y UNIDAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Brigitti es la nueva integrante del banco comunal, ella es estudiante y se dedica al negocio de productos de belleza. Gracias a  esta actividad de consultora en estos artículos, ella solventa parte de sus gastos de estudio superior.
Brigitti tiene 23 años y sus sueños es terminar su carrera profesional y salir adelante por su familia.
La socia solicito el préstamo para comprar perfumes, colonias y cremas de belleza, así poder ampliar su negocio.

Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal, un socio  tuvo permiso de trabajo y se le fotografió después de la reunión y la otra socia es la  nueva integrante del banco comunal.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de materiales de construcción y servicio de taxi.
Los socios agradecen el crédito asignado a su banquito comunal, ellos están contentos con los inversionistas de KIVA y se comprometen a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “JUNTAS Y UNIDAS” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.

Brigitti is a new member of the communal bank. She is a student and she works in the beauty products business. Thanks to this activity as a consultant in these items, she pays for part of her higher education cost.

Brigitti is 23 years old and her dream is to finish her degree and get ahead for her family.

She has asked for this loan to buy perfume, cologne, and beauty creams so she can expand her business.

The borrowers who are pasted onto the group photo were pasted because one had to work and her picture was taken later and the other is a new member of the communal bank.

The other members works selling woven goods, selling clothes, selling groceries, selling construction materials and offering a taxi service.

The borrowers are grateful for the loan to the little bank. They are happy with the Kiva investors and they are committed to making their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy perfume, cologne and beauty creams.

loans.name: Luz Stella

texts.es:
Luz Estela, es una mujer liberal, una persona emprendedora, carismática que le gusta trabajar, conseguir sus propias cosas, satisfacer sus necesidades y deseos, es una mujer que nunca ha permitido que le den nada, pues todo lo consigue gracias a su negocio de venta de ganado.
Negocio que inició por liderazgo, por vocación al trabajo independiente, por superación personal.
Ella tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos a los cuales trata de transmitirle esa seguridad en si misma que tiene ella, ese amor y gusto por el trabajo, quiere que se conviertan en unos empresarios o unos excelentes profesionales, por ello se sacrifica tanto para pagar su educación.
Actualmente la cliente busca la sostenibilidad y el aumento en ventas, las matriculas escolares de sus muchachos la dejaron sin mucho capital para invertir en su negocio, por ello solicita un préstamo para la compra de 6 terneros, los cuales alimentara engordara y posteriormente venderá.
texts.en:
Luz Estela is a liberal woman, an enterprising, charismatic woman who likes to work, get her own things and satisfy her needs and desires. She is a woman who has never allowed anyone to give her anything, so everything she gets is thanks to her business selling cattle.

She began her business by leadership, by vocation for independent work, and for self-improvement.

She is 49 years old, married, and has 4 children, who she tries to teach this self-confidence that she has, this love and pleasure in work. She wants them to become business people or excellent professionals, and for this she sacrifices so much to pay for their education.

Currently, the borrowers seeks sustainability and the increase of sales. The school fees for her children leave her without a lot of capital to invest in her business, so she asks for a loan to purchase 6 calves, which she will feed, fatten, and later sell.

loans.use: to purchase 6 calves, which she will feed, fatten, and later sell.

loans.name: Ezequiel

texts.es:
Ezequiel es un joven de 19 años de edad, el cual se dedica a elaborar mallas para pescar, actividad que aprendió empíricamente y con la cual genera los ingresos para apoyar a su madre en los gastos familiares.
Este joven emprendedor, verraco, dedicado solo tiene como deseo sacar su familia adelante, por ello dedica toda su juventud a trabajar por ellos, lo hace con mucho gusto y se siente feliz por los resultados que ha obtenido en términos de calidad de vida.
Su actividad la realiza manual, demora mucho en tejer una malla, para poder agilizar su proceso necesita crear una plantilla pero no cuenta con el dinero para comprar el material, por ello solicita un préstamo para comprar dichos insumos y materiales para elaborar mallas, con el objetivo de mejorar sus tiempos de producción.
texts.en:
Ezequiel is a 19-year-old young man who makes fishing net meshes, an activity which he learned by watching and which provides him with the means to help his mother with household expenses.

This resourceful, brave and dedicated young man only wishes to support his family and so engages his whole vitality on their behalf, which he does gladly. He is happy with the results achieved in quality of life. 

His occupation is performed manually. It takes a long time to weave a mesh and in order to be able to streamline the process he needs to create a template. However, he does not have the means to buy the material and so he is requesting a loan to purchase these supplies to make meshes and, as a result, improve his production time.

loans.use: to buy materials to make fishing net meshes

loans.name: Yesica Yulieth

texts.es:
Yesica es una joven de 19 años de edad la cual tiene dos hijos la mayor de 3 y el menor de 1. Vive en unión libre con su pareja. Ella es una mujer humilde que por tener 2 hijos a tan temprana edad le toco trabajar para generar los recursos suficientes para no pasar necesidades, ella se dedica a vender alimentos, usa los enseres de su hogar para fabricarlos, pero por el uso diario estos se han deteriorado.
La joven quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar enseres, ollas, fogón grande y materia prima para elaborar almuerzos, su propósito es contar con su propio material de trabajo e ir buscando mayor independencia, también aumentara su producción por lo que las ventas serán mayores y habrá mejores ingresos que ayudaran mucho a su familia.
texts.en:
Yesica is a young woman, 19 years old, who has two children, the older one is 3 and the younger one is 1. She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. She is a humble woman who, by having 2 children at such a young age, had to work to generate sufficient resources so not to lack anything. She works selling food, she uses household equipment to make it, but due to daily use they have deteriorated.

The young woman wants to ask for a loan to purchase basic tools, pots, a large stove, and raw material to make lunches. Her goal is to have her own working material and to seek more independence. She will also increase her production so that her sales will be greater and there will be more income which will help her family a lot.

loans.use: to purchase basic tools, pots, a large stove and raw materials to make lunches.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer soltera cabeza de familia de 29 años de edad la cual se dedica a vender mercancía por encargo.
La cliente quiere solicitar un préstamo, el objetivo principal del crédito es trabajar su propio capital, destinara todo el dinero en comprar promociones de la revista y vender mercancía como propia, aun teniendo la línea de venta por encargo, pero contando con unidades disponibles para la venta.
Venderá principalmente lencería para dama.
Su sueño es tener un almacén de ropa para mujer, vivir cómodamente y ser muy feliz junto con su hijo de 5 años de edad.
texts.en:
Luisa is a single woman, the head of the household, 29 years old, who works selling merchandise by order.

The borrower wants to ask for a loan, the primary objective for the loan is to work her own capital, all the money will be destined to purchase catalog promotions and sell merchandise as her own, still having the line of sales by order, but having some items available to sell.

She will primarily sell lingerie for women.

Her dream is to have a women's clothing store, to live comfortably and be very happy with her 5-year-old son.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of lingerie for women in bulk, she hopes to have a retail space as soon as possible.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y su hija en casa propia, por la necesidad de tener más entradas de dinero para suplir las necesidades familiares decidió poner en práctica lo que sus padres le enseñaron hace mucho tiempo, es así como  actualmente ella se dedica a cultivar maíz para alimentar a su familia y para poder vender, además tiene una pequeña tienda de productos varios.
